news.title: Customers urged to fix energy bills as prices fall from July
news.summary: A typical annual domestic energy bill will drop by £129 in July, the first fall in a year.

news.title: Netanyahu accuses Starmer of being on 'wrong side of humanity' and siding with Hamas
news.summary: The UK, France and Canada condemned the expanded Israeli military operation in Gaza this week.

news.title: Man in Norway wakes to find huge container ship in garden
news.summary: Johan Helberg says he was "quite astonished" to look out of his window and see the vessel.

news.title: 'It's dehumanising': Harvard's foreign students reel from Trump administration ban
news.summary: Harvard has around 6,800 foreign students currently - a third are from China, and more than 700 are Indian.

news.title: Doctors threaten strike action after 4% pay offer
news.summary: The British Medical Association, which represents doctors, said the increase was "derisory".

news.title: Labubu fan fury as viral dolls pulled from stores after reports of customer fighting
news.summary: The popular toys have been removed from shelves until June, following reports of customers fighting over them.

news.title: New satellite photos show damaged North Korean warship
news.summary: Kim Jong Un has called the shipyard accident a "criminal act" and vowed to find those responsible.

news.title: Drivers claim cars damaged and keys missing after using ‘secure’ airport parking service
news.summary: Meet-and-greet firm denies liability after a customer's car is damaged in a hit-and-run accident.

news.title: Liverpool boss Arne Slot: Excuses are for teams that don't win the league
news.summary: In a wide-ranging interview with the BBC, the head coach says it is "nice" his side won the Premier League so he does not have to rely on them.

news.title: What not to miss at Radio 1's Big Weekend 2025
news.summary: Four stages, 100 acts. Not sure where to start? Greg James, Jack Saunders and Sian Eleri have you covered.
